===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=くうき}} compound {{m|ltc|空氣|tr= khuwng  khjɨjH|lit=empty vapor}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} {{m|zh|空氣|tr=khong-khì}}.
